[Good] nickname = rs_gun_mark01 equipment = rs_gun_mark01 category = equipment price = 380000 item_icon = equipment\models\commodities\nn_icons\EQUIPICON_gun.3db combinable = false ids_name = 0 ;GENERATESTRRES("Liberty Mk I") ids_info = 0 ;GENERATEXMLRES("R8-F "Liberty" Liberty Laser Cannon Mk I
This is a laser-based weapon that provides a high refire rate at a reduced damage output. This weapon is most effective against positron shields and weakest against graviton shields.

This new Energy Missile Mk1 is a very unique weapon now on the market. With a missile that does the same amount of hull and shield damage on their victim as well as extreme tracking ability. The Energy Missile Mk1 is the 1st generation of its kind. POWER USAGE PER SHOT = 113
